title: Lesson 91
paragraph: Adoption and support involve welcoming new ideas or practices while providing guidance and resources. Continuous efforts, adjustment, and community engagement strengthen outcomes.

words.meaning: able to be accepted or taken up
words.example: The new policy is adoptable across departments.

words.meaning: to accompany someone for protection or guidance
words.example: Security escorted the VIP to the venue.

words.meaning: to make longer, larger, or more comprehensive
words.example: The company extended the deadline for submissions.
Biasness in reporting can affect public opinion.
She presented a novel solution to the problem.

words.meaning: to bring under single authority or control
words.example: The company centralized its operations in one office.

words.meaning: to modify or adapt to new conditions
words.example: He adjusted the settings for better performance.

words.meaning: grounds and buildings of a university or school
words.example: The students walked across the campus to their classes.

words.meaning: a unit of heredity in living organisms
words.example: The gene determines certain traits in offspring.
